questions: Can you elaborate on your experience in Information Technology?
What motivated you to take a professional gap for personal development?
How have you kept your skills in Python, Kubernetes, and AWS sharp during your time off?
Can you provide examples of projects you have worked on using Python?
How comfortable are you with using Kubernetes in a production environment?
Have you obtained any certifications related to AWS or other cloud services?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in Information Technology?
Can you discuss a challenging technical problem you have successfully solved in the past?
How do you approach learning new technologies and tools in the IT field?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively in a fast-paced IT environment?
